module.name: LazDbgLog
module.short: Contains utility routines used in the Lazarus Debugger and IDE.

descr.p: lazdbglog.pas is part of the LazUtils package.

element.name: MemSizeString
element.short: Returns the memory size needed for the specified string value including a 4-byte Pointer for the string length.

element.name: MemSizeString.Result
element.short: PtrUInt value with the number of bytes needed for the string including its length.

element.name: MemSizeString.s
element.short: String examined to get the Length of the memory used for the value.

element.name: MemSizeFPList
element.short: Returns the memory size needed for the specified TFPList instance, or 0 when List is unassigned.

element.name: MemSizeFPList.Result
element.short: PtrUInt value with the number of bytes needed for the TFPList instance including the Pointers needed for its current Capacity.

element.name: MemSizeFPList.List
element.short: TFPList instance examined in the routine.

element.name: GetStringRefCount
element.short: Returns the reference count for the specified String.

element.name: GetStringRefCount.Result
element.short: PtrInt value with the reference count for S, or -1 if S is an empty string ('').

element.name: GetStringRefCount.s
element.short: Constant string parameter examined in the routine.
